articles.title: Stock Market Today: Top 10 things to know before the market opens today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Stock Market News: Trends in the SGX Nifty indicate a cautious opening for the broader index in India with a loss of 2 points on Tuesday in sync with flat trading at Wall Street and mixed cues from Asian peers
articles.content:
The market is expected to open flat as trends in the SGX Nifty indicate a cautious opening for the broader index in India with a loss of 2 points.
The BSE Sensex rallied 847 points to 60,747, while … [+6151 chars]

articles.title: TVB actor Mat Yeung released from prison, talks about 'worst torment' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Shadow Of Justice actor was sentenced to 18 days in jail for driving while under the influence of alcohol.
articles.content: TVB actor Mat Yeung has been released from prison after serving time in Hong Kongs Stanley Prison following a conviction for careless driving. He was released a day earlier than expected, on Saturday… [+1906 chars]
